data.text: When people look at everything that God has placed in the skies, they can see that he is very great;
Day after day it is as though the sun proclaims the glory of God,
But what they declare about God goes throughout the world,
it rises each morning like a bridegroom who is happy as he comes out of his bedroom after his wedding.
The sun rises at one side of the sky and goes across the sky and sets on the other side,
The instructions that Yahweh has given us are perfect;
It is good for people to revere Yahweh;
The things that God has decided are more valuable than gold,
Furthermore, by reading them I learn what things are good to do and what things are evil,
But there is no one who can know all his errors [RHQ];
Keep me from doing things that I know are wrong;
O Yahweh, you are like an overhanging rock [MET] under which I can be safe; you are the one who protects me.
